price: 7. Ama edde yabne ken gennaaqoh agabuu kee ken say-naqoosak wadir akam gurrusa mari, toysa woo mari usun umaanet caddok tatre mara.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
